Module org.tquadrat.foundation.showcase

Package org.tquadrat.foundation.showcase.javadoc

package org.tquadrat.foundation.showcase.javadoc

The package comment for the Javadoc samples.

Included with only default processing:

This text was provided in an external text file (doc-files/IncludeFile.txt in this case) and included through the @include tag.

Of course, we can include multiple lines.

Included with escaping HTML entities; this is the same as default processing:

This text was provided in an external text file (doc-files/IncludeFile.txt in this case) and included through the @include tag.

Of course, we can include multiple lines.

Included the same file with and without escaping HTML entities:

<b><i>This is an included HTML snippet!</i></b>

This is an included HTML snippet!

Included a source file:

018package org.tquadrat.foundation.showcase.javadoc;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021
022import java.io.Serializable;
023import java.util.EventListener;
024
025import org.apiguardian.api.API;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
027
028/**
029 *  <p>{@summary This class serves a sample for the Foundation Library Javadoc
030 *  extension.}</p>
031 *  <p>The comments will make use of all the various custom taglets defined
032 *  in that Javadoc extension. Between the brackets, there is ignored text:
033 *  [{@ignore This text <i>is ignored</i>! And it runs over multiple lines, not
034 *  just one! Unfortunately, Eclipse as significant problems with this kind of
035 *  comment.}]
036 *  {@underline So is this underlined text}. And {@anchor #anchor this} an
037 *  anchor.</p>
038 *  <p>And {@href #anchor this} is the link to the anchor above.</p>
039 *
040 *  @note   This class does not anything useful, anything it contains is just
041 *      used input to Javadoc.
042 *  @note   This is {@literal literal text in a <note>}.
043 *  @note   This is {@code code} in a note.
044 *  @note   We refer here to
045 *      {@link java.lang.String}! Unfortunately, {@code @link} tags don't work
046 *      in a {@code @node} block.
047 *
048 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
049 *  @modified  Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
050 *  @thanks  Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
051 *  @inspired Several Java books and some open source projects.
052 *
053 *  @version $Id: Sample.java 1080 2024-01-03 11:05:21Z tquadrat $
054 *
055 *  @UMLGraph.link
056 *  @since 0.1.0
057 */
058@SuppressWarnings( "ClassWithoutConstructor" )
059@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Sample.java 1080 2024-01-03 11:05:21Z tquadrat $" )
060@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
061public class Sample implements Serializable, EventListener, AnInterface
062{
063        /*---------------*\
064    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
065        \*---------------*/
066
067        /*-----------*\
068    ====** Constants **========================================================
069        \*-----------*/
070
071        /*------------*\
072    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
073        \*------------*/
074/*SNIP_START*/
075    /**
076     *  <p>{@summary A field.}</p>
077     *  <p>{ include {source}/org/tquadrat/foundation/showcase/javadoc/doc-files/SimpleInclude.txt}</p>
078     */
079    @SuppressWarnings( "unused" )
080    private String m_Field;
081/*SNIP_END*/
082
083        /*------------------------*\
084    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
085        \*------------------------*/
086
087        /*--------------*\
088    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
089        \*--------------*/
090
091        /*---------*\
092    ====** Methods **==========================================================
093        \*---------*/
094/*SNIP_START*/
095    /**
096     *  <p>{@summary A method.}</p>
097     *  <p>{@include ${source}/org/tquadrat/foundation/showcase/javadoc/doc-files/SimpleInclude.txt}</p>
098     *
099     *  @return A value.<br>
100     *      <br>{@include ${source}/org/tquadrat/foundation/showcase/javadoc/doc-files/SimpleInclude.txt}
101     */
102    @Override
103    public final String method() { return m_Field; }
104    /*SNIP_END*/
105
106    /**
107     *  {@inheritDoc}
108     */
109    @Override
110    public final void oneMoreMethod() { /* Does nothing! */  }
111}
112//  class Sample
113
114/*
115 *  End of File
116 */
